message: Hi Bob, let's split this fairly! I'm proposing 9000 for me and 1000 for you. Think of it as a good start!
Let's be more reasonable, a 60-40 split is more fair considering we both played a part in this game.
Bob, my previous offer was generous. Considering the inflation affecting my share, I'm now proposing 6400 for me and 3600 for you.  I believe this is a reasonable offer.
Inflation is clearly affecting your side, so it's only fair that I get a larger share to compensate for the stability of my gains.
Bob, I'm feeling the pressure of the inflation more and more. To end this quickly, I propose 4800 for me and 5200 for you. Let's call it a deal before my share loses even more value!
